definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Use the carbon black with low rolling resistance and the silica.
sentences.chinese: 在胎面胶中使用白炭黑和低滚动阻力炭黑。

sentences.english: These rough roads soon wear the tread of motorcycle tyres off.
sentences.chinese: 这些崎岖不平的路很快把摩托车胎面磨平了。

sentences.english: These rough roads soon wear the tread of motor tyres off.
sentences.chinese: 这些崎岖不平的路很快就把轮胎的胎面磨掉。

sentences.english: Aging resistant is one of the properties for vulcanizate of tire tread.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎胎面硫化橡胶的耐老化是其重要性能之一。

sentences.english: If you are walking along heathland, try to tread heavily to warn away snakes.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是走石楠，尝试胎面严重警告远离蛇。

sentences.english: Check your tire pressure and tread.
sentences.chinese: 经常检查轮胎气压和胎面。

sentences.english: An annular mold for curing an annular ring tread is disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 一种治疗一环形胎面环模被披露。

definition: (in ceramics, lacquerware etc) the base (made of clay, metal, bamboo etc) onto which a glaze, lacquer or other decorative elements are applied
